[DESC ES]Una función de pausa es útil para<br>que el jugador se tome un descanso.

[NAME EN]Save Games
[NAME GE]Save Games
[NAME CH]保存游戏
[NAME TU]Oyunu Kaydet
[DESC EN]Save games allows you to resume the game at a later time.
[DESC GE]Das speichern von Spielständen<br>erlaubt es das Spiel zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt<br>an gleicher Stelle wieder aufzunehmen.
[DESC CH]保存游戏可以让你在以后的时间恢复并且继续游戏.
[DESC TU]Oyunu kaydet seçeneği, oyuna daha sonra kaldığınız yerden devam etmenize olanak sağlar.

[DESC FR]Sauvegarder les parties permet de reprendre le jeu ultérieurement.
[NAME PB]Salvar jogo
[DESC PB]Salvar jogos permite que você retome o jogo de onde parou.

[DESC ES]Guardar juegos le permite reanudar el juego más tarde.

[DESC CZ]Ukládání her umožňuje vrátit se ke hře v pozdější době.

[DESC IT]Salvataggio ti consente di riprendere il gioco in un secondo momento.

[NAME PL]Quick Time Eventy
[DESC EN]In Quick Time events, the player must press<br>several key combinations in a short time to pass.
[DESC GE]Bei Quick-Time-Events muss der Spieler in kurzer Zeit<br>mehrere Tastenkombinationen drücken um zu bestehen.
[DESC CH]在QTE中，玩家要在短时间内<br>按下多个按键才能通过.
[DESC TU]In Quick Time events, the player must press<br>several key combinations in a short time to pass.
[DESC FR]In Quick Time events, the player must press<br>several key combinations in a short time to pass.
[DESC PB]In Quick Time events, the player must press<br>several key combinations in a short time to pass.
[DESC CT]在QTE，玩家要在短時間<br>輸入多個指令才可過關
[DESC HU]In Quick Time events, the player must press<br>several key combinations in a short time to pass.
[DESC ES]En los eventos de tiempo rápido, el jugador debe pulsar<br>varias combinaciones de teclas en poco tiempo para pasar.
[DESC CZ]V akcích Quick Time musí hráč v krátkém čase stisknout několik kombinací kláves, aby prošel.
[DESC KO]In Quick Time events, the player must press<br>several key combinations in a short time to pass.
[DESC RU]In Quick Time events, the player must press<br>several key combinations in a short time to pass.
[DESC IT]In Quick Time events, the player must press<br>several key combinations in a short time to pass.
[DESC AR]In Quick Time events, the player must press<br>several key combinations in a short time to pass.
[DESC JA]QTEの場面では、瞬間的なボタン入力を行い、<br>その成否で展開が変化します。
[DESC PL]W Quick Time Event'ach gracz musi nacisnąć<br>kilka kombinacji klawiszy w krótkim czasie, aby  przejść dalej.

[NAME PL]Rozpoznawanie twarzy
[DESC EN]With facial recognitions, your appearance<br>and emotions can be transferred directly into the game.
[DESC GE]Mit Gesichtserkennungen kann dein Aussehen<br>und deine Emotionen direkt in das Spiel übertragen werden.

[DESC ES]Con los reconocimientos faciales, su apariencia<br>y las emociones pueden trasladarse directamente al juego.
[DESC CZ]Díky rozpoznávání obličeje lze váš vzhled<br> a emoce přenést přímo do hry.

[NAME PL]Rozpoznawanie mowy
[DESC EN]With this feature you can, for example,<br>conduct dialogs with NPCs using a microphone.
[DESC GE]Mit diesem Feature kannst du zum Beispiel<br>Dialoge mit NPCs mittels eines Mikrophons führen.
